languages.text: "А что, думаешь, это так сложно? Однажды нам с товарищами довелось тайком проникнуть на территорию верхнего города в поисках добротной питейной, где обретались сильные местного мира. В другой раз наш полк бросили на защиту высших шпилей мира-улья... И я все поняла. Увидела, как можно жить тем, кто родился с бриллиантовой ложкой во рту, а не походной лопаткой в заднице".

traits.locale_text: "А что, думаешь, это так сложно? Однажды нам с товарищами довелось тайком проникнуть на территорию верхнего города в посках добротной питейной, где обретались сильные местного мира. В другой раз наш полк бросили на защиту высших шпилей мира-улья... И я все поняла. Увидела, как можно жить тем, кто родился с бриллиантовой ложкой во рту, а не походной лопаткой в заднице".

languages.text: "What, you think it's difficult? Once, me and my fellow Guardsmen snuck into the upper city in search of a good watering hole where the high and mighty of that world congregated. Another time our regiment was sent to defend the tallest spires on a hive world... and I had an epiphany. I saw how the other half lives, and by half, I mean the ones born with a diamond spoon in their mouth, instead of an entrenching shovel rammed up their arse."
languages.original_text: "А что, думаешь, это так сложно? Однажды нам с товарищами довелось тайком проникнуть на территорию верхнего города в поисках добротной питейной, где обретались сильные местного мира. В другой раз наш полк бросили на защиту высших шпилей мира-улья... И я все поняла. Увидела, как можно жить тем, кто родился с бриллиантовой ложкой во рту, а не походной лопаткой в заднице".

traits.locale_text: "Do you think it's difficult? Once me and my fellow guardsmen sneaked into the upper city in search of a good watering hole where the high and mighty of that world used to gather. Another time our regiment was sent to defend the tallest spires of a hive world... And I had an epiphany. I saw how live those born with a diamond spoon in their mouth instead of an entrenching shovel up their arse."

"Do you think it's difficult? Once me and my fellow guardsmen sneaked into the upper city in search of a good watering hole where the high and mighty of that world used to gather. Another time our regiment was sent to defend the tallest spires of a hive world... And I had an epiphany. I saw how live those born with a diamond spoon in their mouth instead of an entrenching shovel up their arse."

"What, you think it's difficult? Once, me and my fellow Guardsmen snuck into the upper city in search of a good watering hole where the high and mighty of that world congregated. Another time our regiment was sent to defend the tallest spires on a hive world... and I had an epiphany. I saw how the other half lives, and by half, I mean the ones born with a diamond spoon in their mouth, instead of an entrenching shovel rammed up their arse."

"What, you think it's difficult? Once, me and my fellow Guardsmen snuck into the upper city in search of a good watering hole where the high and mighty of that world congregated. Another time our regiment was sent to defend the tallest spires on a hive world... and I had an epiphany. I saw how the other half lives, and by half, I mean the ones born with a diamond spoon in their mouth, instead of an entrenching shovel rammed up their arse."

"What, you think it's difficult? Once, me and my fellow Guardsmen snuck into the upper city in search of a good watering hole where the high and mighty of that world congregated. Another time our regiment was sent to defend the tallest spires on a hive world... and I had an epiphany. I saw how the other half lives, and by half, I mean the ones born with a diamond spoon in their mouth, instead of an entrenching shovel rammed up their arse."

languages.text: “怎么，你觉得这很困难吗？有一次，我和我在卫队的伙伴溜进了巢都上层，想找间不错的酒吧。那个世界所有的上层人物都聚集在那个地方。还有一次，我们所在的师团被派去守卫另一个巢都世界最高的尖塔……于是我突然就顿悟了，我看到了另一半人都是怎么生活的。我说的‘另一半人’，指的是那些出生时嘴里含着钻石勺子的人，不是屁眼里塞着工兵铲的人。”
languages.original_text: "What, you think it's difficult? Once, me and my fellow Guardsmen snuck into the upper city in search of a good watering hole where the high and mighty of that world congregated. Another time our regiment was sent to defend the tallest spires on a hive world... and I had an epiphany. I saw how the other half lives, and by half, I mean the ones born with a diamond spoon in their mouth, instead of an entrenching shovel rammed up their arse."

traits.locale_text: “怎么，你觉得这很困难吗？有一次，我和我在卫队的伙伴溜进了巢都上层，想找间不错的酒吧。那个世界所有的上层人物都聚集在那个地方。还有一次，我们所在的师团被派去守卫另一个巢都世界最高的尖塔……于是我突然就顿悟了，我看到了另一半人都是怎么生活的。我说的‘另一半人’，指的是那些出生时嘴里含着钻石勺子的人，不是屁眼里塞着工兵铲的人。”

languages.original_text: "What, you think it's difficult? Once, me and my fellow Guardsmen snuck into the upper city in search of a good watering hole where the high and mighty of that world congregated. Another time our regiment was sent to defend the tallest spires on a hive world... and I had an epiphany. I saw how the other half lives, and by half, I mean the ones born with a diamond spoon in their mouth, instead of an entrenching shovel rammed up their arse."

languages.text: «¿Qué, cree que es difícil? Una vez, me colé con mis compañeros de la Guardia en la ciudad superior para buscar un buen antro en el que se reunieran los poderosos de ese mundo colmena... y tuve una epifanía. Vi cómo vivía la otra mitad, y con eso me refiero a los que nacían con un diamante bajo el brazo, en lugar de con una pala de trincheras en el culo».
languages.original_text: "What, you think it's difficult? Once, me and my fellow Guardsmen snuck into the upper city in search of a good watering hole where the high and mighty of that world congregated. Another time our regiment was sent to defend the tallest spires on a hive world... and I had an epiphany. I saw how the other half lives, and by half, I mean the ones born with a diamond spoon in their mouth, instead of an entrenching shovel rammed up their arse."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué, cree que es difícil? Una vez, me colé con mis compañeros de la Guardia en la ciudad superior para buscar un buen antro en el que se reunieran los poderosos de ese mundo... y tuve una epifanía. Vi cómo vivía la otra mitad, y con eso me refiero a los que nacían con un diamante bajo el brazo, en lugar de con una pala de trincheras en el culo».

languages.text: 「それが難しいって思うの？昔、アタシと仲間の兵士たちは、その世界の偉い人たちが集まるおいしい水飲み場を求めて、上層都市に忍び込んだことがあるんだ。またあるときは、連隊がハイヴワールドで最も高い尖塔を守るために派遣された…そして、アタシは天啓を得た。残りの半分がどのように生きているのかを見たんだ。半分というのは、塹壕を掘るシャベルを突っ込む代わりに、ダイヤモンドのスプーンを口にくわえて生まれてきた人たちのことさ」
languages.original_text: "What, you think it's difficult? Once, me and my fellow Guardsmen snuck into the upper city in search of a good watering hole where the high and mighty of that world congregated. Another time our regiment was sent to defend the tallest spires on a hive world... and I had an epiphany. I saw how the other half lives, and by half, I mean the ones born with a diamond spoon in their mouth, instead of an entrenching shovel rammed up their arse."

traits.locale_text: 「それが難しいって思うの？昔、アタシと仲間の兵士たちは、その世界の偉い人たちが集まるおいしい水飲み場を求めて、上層都市に忍び込んだことがあるんだ。またあるときは、連隊がハイヴワールドで最も高い尖塔を守るために派遣された…そして、アタシは天啓を得た。残りの半分がどのように生きているのかを見たんだ。半分というのは、塹壕を掘るシャベルを突っ込む代わりに、ダイヤモンドのスプーンを口にくわえて生まれてきた人たちのことさ」

languages.text: "Haltet Ihr das etwa für schwer? Meine Kameraden und ich haben uns einmal in die Oberstadt geschlichen, um eine gute Kneipe zu finden, in der die Reichen und Mächtigen dieser Welt sich treffen. Ein anderes Mal sollte unser Regiment die höchsten Türme auf einer Makropolwelt verteidigen ... und ich hatte eine Erleuchtung. Ich habe gesehen, wie die andere Hälfte lebt. Und mit 'Hälfte' meine ich jene, die mit einem Diamantlöffel im Mund geboren werden, nicht mit einem Feldspaten, der ihnen in den Arsch gerammt wird."
languages.original_text: "What, you think it's difficult? Once, me and my fellow Guardsmen snuck into the upper city in search of a good watering hole where the high and mighty of that world congregated. Another time our regiment was sent to defend the tallest spires on a hive world... and I had an epiphany. I saw how the other half lives, and by half, I mean the ones born with a diamond spoon in their mouth, instead of an entrenching shovel rammed up their arse."

traits.locale_text: "Haltet Ihr das etwa für schwer? Meine Kameraden und ich haben uns einmal in die Oberstadt geschlichen, um eine gute Kneipe zu finden, in der die Reichen und Mächtigen dieser Welt sich treffen. Ein anderes Mal sollte unser Regiment die höchsten Türme auf einer Makropolwelt verteidigen ... und ich hatte eine Erleuchtung. Ich habe gesehen, wie die andere Hälfte lebt. Und mit 'Hälfte' meine ich jene, die mit einem Diamantlöffel im Mund geboren werden, nicht mit einem Feldspaten, der ihnen in den Arsch gerammt wird."

languages.text: « Parce que vous croyez que c'est difficile ? Un jour, j'ai dû me glisser dans la ville supérieure avec d'autres gardes pour chercher un troquet où les grands de ce monde rassemblaient. Une autre fois, notre régiment a été chargé de défendre les tours les plus hautes d'un monde ruche... et là, j'ai eu une révélation. J'ai vu comment vivait l'autre moitié, c'est-à-dire ceux qui sont nés avec une cuillère en diamant dans la bouche au lieu d'une pelle à tranchée dans les mains. »
languages.original_text: "What, you think it's difficult? Once, me and my fellow Guardsmen snuck into the upper city in search of a good watering hole where the high and mighty of that world congregated. Another time our regiment was sent to defend the tallest spires on a hive world... and I had an epiphany. I saw how the other half lives, and by half, I mean the ones born with a diamond spoon in their mouth, instead of an entrenching shovel rammed up their arse."

traits.locale_text: « Parce que vous croyez que c'est difficile ? Un jour, j'ai dû me glisser dans la ville supérieure avec d'autres gardes pour chercher un troquet où les grands de ce monde rassemblaient. Une autre fois, notre régiment a été chargé de défendre les tours les plus hautes d'un monde ruche... et là, j'ai eu une révélation. J'ai vu comment vivait l'autre moitié, c'est-à-dire ceux qui sont nés avec une cuillère en diamant dans la bouche au lieu d'une pelle à tranchée dans les mains. »

languages.text: "Ne? Zor olduğunu mu sanıyorsun? Bir keresinde birkaç Muhafız'la beraber üst şehre sızıp o dünyanın kodamanlarının takıldığı güzel bir bara gitmiştik. Bir seferinde de alayımız, bir kovan dünyanın en yüksek kulelerini savunmaya gönderilmişti. O gün aydınlanma yaşadım. İnsanların diğer yarısının; yani götünde höllükle değil de ağzında gümüş kaşıkla doğanların nasıl yaşadığını gördüm."
languages.original_text: "What, you think it's difficult? Once, me and my fellow Guardsmen snuck into the upper city in search of a good watering hole where the high and mighty of that world congregated. Another time our regiment was sent to defend the tallest spires on a hive world... and I had an epiphany. I saw how the other half lives, and by half, I mean the ones born with a diamond spoon in their mouth, instead of an entrenching shovel rammed up their arse."

traits.locale_text: "Ne? Zor olduğunu mu düşünüyorsun? Bir keresinde birkaç diğer Muhafız'la beraber üst şehre sızıp, o dünyanın kodamanlarının gittiği güzel bir barda takılmıştık. Başka bir keresindeyse alayımız bir kovan dünyadaki en yüksek kuleleri savunmaya gönderilmişti ve o sırada bir aydınlanma yaşadım. İnsanların diğer yarısının nasıl yaşadığını gördüm. Yani bebekken götüne hendek kazma küreği değil de, ağzına elmas kaşıklarla mama tıkılanların."
